/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban scene below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a dynamic element to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
